original: intros x y m. apply sound_excluded_middle_ident with (x := x) in m as H. destruct H as [H | H]. - apply sound_orp_intros1. intros n Hn. apply sat_impp. intros n0 Hnn0 H0. apply sound_falsep_elim in H0. apply H0. - apply sound_orp_intros2. intros n Hn. apply sat_impp. intros n0 Hnn0 H0. apply sound_falsep_elim in H0. apply H0.
